Method Detail

registerUdpListener

public void registerUdpListener(ConnectionIdentifier key,
                                IUpperLayer listener)
                         throws java.util.TooManyListenersException
Description copied from interface: IUdpLayer
Register the given IReceivingListener as upper layer client, able to receive WPDUs from this connection. This method has to be called on the connecting step, before any CosemPDUs are sent over the particular upper layer

Specified by:
registerUdpListener in interface IUdpLayer
Parameters:
key - Key to identify this listener
listener - The upper layer object to register
Throws:
java.util.TooManyListenersException - If another listener is already registered with the given key

removeUdpListener

public void removeUdpListener(ConnectionIdentifier key)
Description copied from interface: IUdpLayer
Removes the IReceivingListener behind the given key from this connection. Further WPDUs with its WPort as destination are discarded. Use this method to 'close' the connection to the particular remote server.

Specified by:
removeUdpListener in interface IUdpLayer
Parameters:
key - Key of the listener to remove

sendOverUdp

public void sendOverUdp(byte[] data,
                        java.net.SocketAddress destination)
                 throws java.io.IOException
Description copied from interface: IUdpLayer
Sends the given bytes to the given remote Smart Meter

Specified by:
sendOverUdp in interface IUdpLayer
Parameters:
data - Bytes to sent
destination - Address/Port of the remote smart meter
Throws:
java.io.IOException

startListening

public void startListening()
Starts this connection to listen for incoming datagrams
